mapper.insert: insert into recruit_member( recruit_board_id, member_id) values( #{recruitBoardId}, #{memberId})
insert into recruit_member( recruit_board_id, member_id, state) values( #{recruitBoardId}, #{memberId}, true)
mapper.select: select rb.recruit_board_id, rb.title, rb.start_date, rb.end_date, m.nickname, count(case when rm.state = 1 then 1 end) as current, rb.recruit_total from recruit_board rb inner join member m on rb.member_id = m.member_id left join recruit_member rm on rb.recruit_board_id = rm.recruit_board_id where rm.member_id=#{memberId} and rm.state=1 group by rb.recruit_board_id order by rb.recruit_board_id desc
select * from recruit_member where member_id = #{memberId} and recruit_board_id = #{recruitBoardId}
mapper.delete: delete from recruit_member where member_id = #{memberId} and recruit_board_id = #{recruitBoardId}
mapper.select: select rcm.member_id, rcm.created_date, m.nickname, m.email, m.birth_date, m.introduce, m.gender from recruit_board rcb left outer join recruit_member rcm on rcb.recruit_board_id=rcm.recruit_board_id inner join member m on rcm.member_id=m.member_id where rcb.recruit_board_id=#{recruitBoardId} and rcm.state is null
select m.member_id, m.photo, m.nickname from recruit_member rm inner join member m on rm.member_id=m.member_id where recruit_board_id=#{recruitBoardId} and rm.state=1
